price: Ni Umumenyi w’ibitagaragara n’ibigaragara! Nta ho ahuriye n’ibyo bamubangikanya na byo.
arabic: عَٰلِمِ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ فَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: ʿālimi al-ghaybi wal-shahādati fataʿālā ʿammā yush'rikūna
